title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave, indigo dyed, resist applied with stencil (katazome)
dimensions:
H x W: 173.4 x 33 cm (68 1/4 x 13 in.)
Repeat H: 15.9 cm (6 1/4 in.)
description: Stencil resist (katazome) textile with two columns of circles, one containing birds, the other leaves and stems. Surrounded by curling tendrils. Ivory design on blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:

19th century. Medium: cotton
